title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Inquiry-Based Simulation Learning on Kinetic Molecular Theory and Ideal Gas Laws

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of physics concepts (pressure, temperature, volume)
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the relationship between macroscopic properties of gases and microscopic particle motion using molecular kinetic theory simulations.
Learners can predict interactions between variables and analyze experimental results through ideal gas law simulations.
Learners can perform metacognitive reflection on problem-solving strategies based on inquiry/task-based simulation experiences.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
